ValueSet-IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindication.title: IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindication.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client has hypersensitivity to any component of the vaccine-72
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Typhoid vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.-66

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Typhoid vaccination is contraindicated for Ty21a vaccine. Clinical judgement is required for Typbar-TCV or ViPS vaccine. Create a clinical note-224
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Typhoid vaccination is contraindicated for Ty21a vaccine.-97
ValueSet-IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindication.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTTyphoidContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
